```{r setup, include=FALSE}
require(rgdal)
require(leaflet)
require(leaflet.extras)

require(dplyr)
require(readxl)
require(stringr)
```

```{r}
#Loading in my different layers
counties <- readOGR("SouthwestPACounties_Features.geojson")
resilient <- readOGR("SouthwestPAResilientNetwork_.geojson")
aml <- readOGR("AbandonedMineLands_FeaturesT.geojson")
industrialmines <- readOGR("SouthwestPAIndustrialMineral.geojson")
```

```{r}
leaflet() %>%
  #Basemaps that users can choose from 
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldGrayCanvas, options = providerTileOptions(noWrap = TRUE)) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.DarkMatterNoLabels, options = providerTileOptions(noWrap = TRUE)) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Thunderforest.Pioneer, options = providerTileOptions(noWrap = TRUE)) %>%
  
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("Gray Canvas", "Dark Matter", "Pioneer"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE)
  )
  
```
